# MCP Documentation Map

## Client SDK

### Core
- [docs/client-sdk/INDEX.md](docs/client-sdk/INDEX.md): MANDATORY READ. Concepts, architecture, and dependency relationships. Start here.
- [docs/client-sdk/quickstart.md](docs/client-sdk/quickstart.md): Copy-pasteable boilerplate code.

### API & Class Signatures
- [docs/client-sdk/api/client.md](docs/client-sdk/api/client.md): READ for `Client` constructor options, request methods, and connection management.
- [docs/client-sdk/api/transports.md](docs/client-sdk/api/transports.md): READ for `StreamableHTTPClientTransport` (Client HTTP), `StdioClientTransport`, and `SSEClientTransport` (Legacy) information.

### Feature Consumption
- [docs/client-sdk/capabilities/tools.md](docs/client-sdk/capabilities/tools.md): READ for listing and calling tools.
- [docs/client-sdk/capabilities/resources.md](docs/client-sdk/capabilities/resources.md): READ for listing, reading, and subscribing to resources.
- [docs/client-sdk/capabilities/prompts.md](docs/client-sdk/capabilities/prompts.md): READ for listing and retrieving prompts.
- [docs/client-sdk/capabilities/sampling.md](docs/client-sdk/capabilities/sampling.md): READ for handling sampling requests from the server (if building an agent).
- [docs/client-sdk/capabilities/roots.md](docs/client-sdk/capabilities/roots.md): READ for exposing filesystem roots to the server.

### Patterns
- [docs/client-sdk/patterns/host-application.md](docs/client-sdk/patterns/host-application.md): READ for integrating the client into a larger application (Host).

## Server SDK

### Core
- [docs/server-sdk/INDEX.md](docs/server-sdk/INDEX.md): MANDATORY READ. Concepts, architecture, and dependency relationships. Start here.
- [docs/server-sdk/quickstart.md](docs/server-sdk/quickstart.md): Copy-pasteable boilerplate code.

### API & Class Signatures
- [docs/server-sdk/api/mcp-server.md](docs/server-sdk/api/mcp-server.md): READ for `McpServer` constructor options, `registerTool`/`registerResource`/`registerPrompt` methods, and deprecated signatures.
- [docs/server-sdk/api/stdio-server-transport.md](docs/server-sdk/api/stdio-server-transport.md): READ for `StdioServerTransport` (CLI) API.
- [docs/server-sdk/api/streamable-http-server-transport.md](docs/server-sdk/api/streamable-http-server-transport.md): READ for `StreamableHTTPServerTransport` (HTTP/SSE) API.
- [docs/server-sdk/api/sse-server-transport.md](docs/server-sdk/api/sse-server-transport.md): READ for `SSEServerTransport` (Legacy/Deprecated) API.

### Feature Implementation
- [docs/server-sdk/capabilities/tools.md](docs/server-sdk/capabilities/tools.md): READ for syntax on registering tools (`registerTool`) and Zod schema validation.
- [docs/server-sdk/capabilities/resources.md](docs/server-sdk/capabilities/resources.md): READ for resource URI templates and content handling (`registerResource`).
- [docs/server-sdk/capabilities/prompts.md](docs/server-sdk/capabilities/prompts.md): READ for prompt registration patterns (`registerPrompt`).
- [docs/server-sdk/capabilities/sampling.md](docs/server-sdk/capabilities/sampling.md): READ for `server.createMessage` (Sampling) usage.

### Patterns
- [docs/server-sdk/patterns/authentication.md](docs/server-sdk/patterns/authentication.md): READ for OAuth flows and `auth/*` middleware usage.
- [docs/server-sdk/patterns/error-handling.md](docs/server-sdk/patterns/error-handling.md): READ for `McpError` usage and error codes.
- [types.md](types.md): REFERENCE. Index of TypeScript definitions for Client and Server SDKs.
